markdownRemark.html:
The DOMDocument is a class built in to PHP that helps developers navigate an HTML document tree and provides methods to help interact with the document.

Outside Online has a developer blog series! Check out one of the posts I've created call "HTML Parsing with the DOMDocument".

HTML Parsing with the DOMDocument on Outside Online
